VALIDATION.CURRENCY_CODE.SYNTAX: {{field}} must be valid 3-letter currency code (e.g., PLN, EUR, USD)
VALIDATION.CURRENCY_CODE.SCOPE: {{field}} is not in the exchange scope, available currencies: {{scope}}
VALIDATION.ZIP_CODE: zipCode must be in one of the following formats: XX-XXX, XXXXX, XX XXX
VALIDATION.EMAIL: email must be a valid email
